item.title: Rachel add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "He just kept picking them up and laying them down." -- Stephen King

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Lisa Desrochers
item.description: "Oh, for the sin of Satan." (Luc Cain, Personal Demons)" -- Lisa Desrochers

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Richelle Mead
Rachel add a quote by Kami Garcia
item.description: "I loved her, atom by atom, one burning cell at a time." -- Kami Garcia

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Kiersten White
item.description: "Bleep stupid bleep bleep faeries and their bleep bleep bleep obsessions. He had better stop bleep bleep bleep the bleep bleep rules or I will bleep bleep bleep the little bleeeeeeep.” All in a completely robotic monotone." -- Kiersten White

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "All good books are alike in that they are truer than if they had really happened and after you are finished reading one you will feel that all that happened to you and afterwards it all belongs to you: the good and the bad, the ecstasy, the remorse and sorrow, the people and the places and how the weather was. If you can get so that you can give that to people, then you are a writer." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Rebecca Maizel
item.description: "Throughout all my histories, I found no one I loved more than you…no one." -- Rebecca Maizel

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Gayle Forman
item.description: "I realize now that dying is easy. Living is hard." -- Gayle Forman

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Gayle Forman
item.description: "If you stay, I'll do whatever you want. I'll quit the band, go with you to New York. But if you need me to go away, I'll do that, too. I was talking to Liz and she said maybe coming back to your old life would be too painful, that maybe it'd be easier for you to erase us. And that would suck, but I'd do it. I can lose you like that if I don't lose you today. I'll let you go. If you stay." -- Gayle Forman

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Brodi Ashton
item.description: "Remembering is easy. It's forgetting that's hard." -- Brodi Ashton

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Brodi Ashton
item.description: "Heroes don't exist. And if they did, I wouldn't be one of them." -- Brodi Ashton
